file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'https://example.com/api/v1'
info:
  title: Test API
  version: '1'
paths:
  /events:
    get:
      description: A list of events
      operationId: getEvents
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json; charset=utf-8:
              schema:
                required:
                  - paging
                  - items
                type: object
                properties:
                  paging:
                    $ref: './common/paging.yaml#/Paging'
                  items:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/StatusResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    StatusResponse:
      properties:
        http_code:
          type: integer
